name: Lightning AI
description: Platform engineer for an AI services startup specializing in full-stack (backend-leaning) orchestration of highly-scalable AI and ML-specific services for B2B and B2C applications. Primarily leveraging Golang, Postgres, Docker, and React (Typescript) on AWS and GCP clouds with tools like Kubernetes/Helm, Cypress, and GORM. Also educating myself on AI and machine learning basics and contributing various Python implementations of AI models as part of day-to-day duties.

name: Zero Vaults, Inc (formerly The Privacy Co.)
description: Primary engineer who led the push in developing the foundational codebase of The Privacy Co.â€™s pivot towards a B2B privacy-as-a-service offering. Leveraged Helm/Kubernetes alongside JavaScript and Golang while designing and building the enterprise-scale service bus architecture for key management, distributed encryption, and PII obfuscation. Formerly lead backend engineer (The Privacy Co.) who contributed >90% of the API, mentoring junior JS engineers, and managed, tested, and maintained all the JS codebases. API and 3rd-party integration work led to significant increases in user engagement and lead investor interest. Leveraged NodeJS, Golang, Redis, MongoDB, and AWS.
